issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: NC of network of brokers won't reconnect after broken pipe
fields.environment:
# lsb_release -a
No LSB modules are available.
Distributor ID: Ubuntu
Description:    Ubuntu 14.04.4 LTS
Release:        14.04
Codename:       trusty

# /local/jdk/bin/java -version
java version "1.8.0_45"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_45-b14)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.45-b02, mixed mode)

comments.body:
Dear Apache team,

We are using your product (apache-activemq-5.14.0) for the high loaded product that provides messages (sms/viber) delivery service across 10+ countries and for 50M + users. 
Just yesterday we faced the described above issue what lead us to unavailability of the service during 47 minutes and many unpleasant calls from our clients. 
Because of this, I would like you to clarify following moments:
The issue has a status OPEN since it created (more that one year) when to expect the fix?
Will an update up to version 5.15.0 fix this problem or decrease a probability of the risk to face this issue again? 

Look forward to have your comments/answer soon.
Thank you!
No reproducer provided to allow this to be investigated
